plot: It's Fuchsia's birthday and Little Bill picks out a present for her at the toy store. Later, at home, he decides to wrap Fuchsia's gift all by himself and accidentally breaks it.
plot_en: It's Fuchsia's birthday and Little Bill picks out a present for her at the toy store. Later, at home, he decides to wrap Fuchsia's gift all by himself and accidentally breaks it.
plot_es: It's Fuchsia's birthday and Little Bill picks out a present for her at the toy store. Later, at home, he decides to wrap Fuchsia's gift all by himself and accidentally breaks it.
title: Little Bill
